name: Gylve Fenris Nagell
description: '''Gylve Fenris Nagell''' (born '''Leif Nagell'''; 28 November 1971), known professionally as '''Fenriz''', is a Norwegian musician, part-time music journalist and online [[radio host]] (with the show "Radio Fenriz") best known as one half of [[black metal]] duo [[Darkthrone]], alongside [[Nocturno Culto]]. Although primarily a drummer and songwriter, he has played bass and guitar and performed vocals for Darkthrone and several other metal bands. Fenriz is famed for his encyclopedic knowledge of metal music, his eager promotion of [[Underground music|underground]] bands and the [[DIY ethic]], and his rejection of the "showbiz side of the music industry". Fenriz was the studio drummer for [[doom metal]] band [[Valhall (band)|Valhall]], and has had several solo projects, including [[folk black metal]] project [[Isengard (Norwegian band)|Isengard]] and [[dark ambient]] project [[Neptune Towers]].
